lastMessages.name: Mia Wallace
lastMessages.message: Here are three tomatoes walking down the street: dad is a tomato, mom is a tomato and a child is a tomato. The tomato child begins to lag behind. The tomato dad gets angry, runs up to the tomato child, crushes the soft-boiled... and says: "Catch up, ketchup!"
